original: @223b # // rgya gar skad du /🔽pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sv'a dha nam /
analyzed: @223b # // rgya gar skad du / pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sv'a dha nam /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs /

original: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la /
translated: After meditating on emptiness in the manner explained previously,

original: padma dmar po'i zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge dh'i: ser po yongs su gyur pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo ste /
analyzed: padma dmar po'i zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge dh'i: ser po yongs su gyur pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo ste /
translated: on a red lotus and moon, the yellow syllable dhīḥ completely transforms into yellow Prajñāpāramitā,

original: ral pa dang dbu rgyan gyi mtha' na mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa /
analyzed: ral pa dang dbu rgyan gyi mtha' na mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa /
translated: with Akṣobhya at the tip of her hair and crown.

original: chos bshad pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
analyzed: chos bshad pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
translated: She makes the mudrā of teaching the dharma.

original: po ti dang ldan pa'i autpala sngon po g-yon pa'i zur na bsnams pa /
analyzed: po ti dang ldan pa'i autpala sngon po g-yon pa'i zur na bsnams pa /
translated: She holds a blue lotus with a book on her left side.

original: stod g-yogs dang stod shag bsnams pa /
analyzed: stod g-yogs dang stod shag bsnams pa /
translated: She wears an upper garment and a lower garment.

original: lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang rgyan mnga' ba zhes bya ba de lta bur bsgoms la /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang rgyan mnga' ba zhes bya ba de lta bur bsgoms la /
translated: She possesses divine clothes and ornaments.

original: aom dh'i:shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya ba'o //
analyzed: aom dh'i:shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya ba'o //
translated: Meditate on her like that and recite the mantra: Oṃ dhīḥ śruti smṛti vijaye svāhā.

original: mdor bsdus pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs so //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom Sādhana in Brief

original: m'a la ba zhes bya ba dha byang chub sems dpa'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: m'a la ba zhes bya ba dha byang chub sems dpa'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The Mālava Perfection of Wisdom Sādhana, composed by the bodhisattva Śrī Mahājana, translated by the monk Śīlapāla.
